seo.title: FixPic - Free Online Image Tool | AI Background Removal, Watermark Removal, Compression, Resize
seo.description: Free Online Image Processing Tool: AI Smart Background Removal, Watermark Removal, Fake Transparent Background Removal, Image Compression, and Resizing. Fast, free, and privacy-friendly.

ai-remove-background.title: AI Background Remover - Free Online Automatic Image Background Removal | FixPic
ai-remove-background.description: Free AI-powered background removal tool that automatically identifies and removes any background, generating transparent PNG images with just one click. No registration requiredâ€”start using it right away!

remove-watermark.title: AI Watermark Remover - Free Online Image Watermark Removal | FixPic
remove-watermark.description: Free AI-powered watermark removal tool that automatically detects and removes watermarks, logos, and text from images. Experience clean results in just seconds.

remove-fake-transparency.title: Remove Fake Transparency - Repair Checkerboard Background to Transparent PNG | FixPic
remove-fake-transparency.description: Convert the fake transparent backgrounds (gray and white checkerboard) exported from AI tools like Midjourney and Lovart into true transparent PNGs. A free online tool.

compress.title: Image Compression - Free Online Compression for PNG, JPG, WebP | FixPic
compress.description: Free online image compression tool for lossless reduction of file size. Supports conversion of PNG, JPG, and WebP formats, making it fast and easy to use.

resize.title: Resize Your Images - Free Online Image Resizer | FixPic
resize.description: Free online image resizing tool that allows you to precisely adjust the width and height of your images while maintaining the aspect ratio. Supports PNG, JPG, and WebP formats.

app.title: FixPic
app.footer: FixPic - AI background removal powered by Replicate, watermark removal supported by Dewatermark.ai.

descriptions.aiRemoveBg: AI-powered background removal automatically identifies and eliminates any background, generating a transparent PNG.
